nodes.text: Rogue One: A Star Wars Story - The Official Collector's Edition

Rogue One: A Star Wars Story The Official Collector's Edition is a commemorative magazine covering the film Rogue One: A Star Wars Story. It was published by Titan Magazines in paperback on December 20, 2016, and in hardcover on January 17, 2017.

This essential guide to Rogue One: A Star Wars Story brings the brand new Star Wars movie to life, with detailed information and extensive images depicting the characters and worlds explored in Rogue One, as well as presenting unseen concept art and unique behind-the-scenes imagery.
The title states that Jyn Erso was captured on Corulag and arrested and sent to Wobani. Other sources, however, such as Rebel Rising, place her arrest and capture in the Five Points system.
